verbose_text: The need of petrochemical industry in mid-2000s promoted MBR applications and increased the scale to thousands m 3 / d. Olympic Games in 2008 and Asian Games in 2010 took place when MBR applications needed further stimulation and the MBR application scale expanded to 10 thousand m 3 / d. Public policy of water resources and environment and membrane industry promoted MBR applications continuously.
evidence: water resources and environment and membrane industry promoted MBR
